scripts.examples:twomoons: npm run build && PYENV_VERSION=arf-js python examples/scripts/make_twomoons_data.py && node examples/scripts/run_twomoons_example.mjs && XDG_CACHE_HOME=/tmp MPLCONFIGDIR=/tmp/mpl PYENV_VERSION=arf-js python examples/scripts/plot_twomoons.py
scripts.examples:digits: npm run build && PYENV_VERSION=arf-js python examples/scripts/make_digits_data.py && node examples/scripts/run_digits_example.mjs && XDG_CACHE_HOME=/tmp MPLCONFIGDIR=/tmp/mpl PYENV_VERSION=arf-js python examples/scripts/plot_digits.py
scripts.examples:mvnorm: npm run build && PYENV_VERSION=arf-js python examples/scripts/make_mvnorm_data.py && node examples/scripts/run_mvnorm_example.mjs && XDG_CACHE_HOME=/tmp MPLCONFIGDIR=/tmp/mpl PYENV_VERSION=arf-js python examples/scripts/plot_mvnorm.py
scripts.examples:titanic: npm run build && PYENV_VERSION=arf-js python examples/scripts/make_titanic_data.py && node examples/scripts/run_titanic_example.mjs && XDG_CACHE_HOME=/tmp MPLCONFIGDIR=/tmp/mpl PYENV_VERSION=arf-js python examples/scripts/plot_titanic.py
scripts.examples:penguins: npm run build && PYENV_VERSION=arf-js python examples/scripts/make_penguins_data.py && node examples/scripts/run_penguins_example.mjs && XDG_CACHE_HOME=/tmp MPLCONFIGDIR=/tmp/mpl PYENV_VERSION=arf-js python examples/scripts/plot_penguins.py
scripts.examples:all: npm run examples:twomoons && npm run examples:digits && npm run examples:mvnorm && npm run examples:titanic && npm run examples:penguins
